Name: 赵金燕（Jinyan Zhao）
Major in Interplanetary and Magnetospheric Physics
entry.content:
Name: 赵金燕（Jinyan Zhao）
Major in Interplanetary and Magnetospheric Physics

💌
1969388649@qq.com
zhaojy@mail.sdu.edu.cn
📞
18463581752

[Mailing Address]
Jinyan Zhao
Institude of Space Science
Shandong University at Weihai
No.180 West Wenhua Road, Weihai, 264209, Shandong, P.R. China

[Education]
Sep.2018-Jun.2021 Shandong University, Geophysics, Master's degree of Science
Sep.2013-Jun.2017 Liaocheng University, Physics, Bachelor's degree of Science

[Research group]
👨‍👨‍👦‍👦Group of Solar Wind-Magnetosphere Interaction (https://iss.wh.sdu.edu.cn/info/1077/1662.htm)
👨‍🎓Principal Investigator: Prof. Dr. Quanqi Shi (https://space.wh.sdu.edu.cn/info/1065/2075.htm)

[Publications]
Working hard on it......

[Academic Activities]
Jun.2020-Aug.2020 Summer School of Chinese Academy of Sciences, "Planetary Science"
Dec.2019 American Geophysical Union (AGU) 2019 Earth and Space Science Meeting
Session: SM51C. Dayside Magnetospheric Interactions II Posters
Presentation Type: Poster
Final Poster Number: SM51C-3212
Day/Time: Friday, 13 December 2019: 08:00 - 12:20, Moscone South, Poster Hall
Session Title: Aurora Response to Solar Wind Dynamic Pressure change: Event Analysis and Statistics.
Jul.2019 Asia Oceania Geosciences Society (AOGS) 2019 Meeting
Session: ST03-Magnetosphere-ionosphere Coupling at Earth and Other Planets: Aurorae and the Magnetospheric/ionosphere Dynamics
Presenter Preference: Poster (ST03-A016)
Poster Display Time D2 (ST): 7/30/2019 (whole day)
Poster Viewing Time D2-PM1: 1:30 PM - 3:30 PM, 7/30/2019
Abstract Title: Ionospheric Response to Solar Wind Dynamic Pressure Increases: Event Analysis and Statistical Results
Jul.2019 Summer School of Peking University, "Solar Storms and Planetary Magnetic Storms"
Aug.2019 Weihai 2019 Meeting: "Coupling processes in critical areas of space physics".
Aug.2018 Weihai 2019 Meeting: "Coupling processes in critical areas of space physics".
May.2018 International Space Science Institute in Beijing (ISSI-BJ) Workshops
Oct.2015-Jun.2017 Laboratory assistant in Optical Communications Laboratory at Liaocheng University. Research on Luminescence Properties of Organic Fluorescent Material Film. (Excellent Master thesis Award)

[Work Experience]
Apr.2020-Jun.2020 Teaching assistant of Hydromechanics in Shandong University at Weihai.
Feb.2019-Apr.2019 Teaching assistant of Hydromechanics in Shandong University at Weihai.
Sep.2018-Jun.2019 Assistant of foreign scholar in Shandong University at Weihai
Sep.2016-Jan.2017 Physical teacher in a middle school at Liaocheng.
Oct.2015-Jun.2017 Lab assistant in Optical Communications Laboratory at Liaocheng University.

[Career Objectives]
🔍 To capitalize on the technical skills and experience gained during my academic career, and find innovation solutions to real-word problems.
📚 To further develop my skills and knowledge base in Geophysics.
⭐️ To pass on my knowledge, expertise and love of physics to the next generation.

[Hobby] Calligraphy; Cooking

Our dreams are like stars in the sky, you may never touch them, but if you follow them they will lead you to your destiny.
梦想就像星星，或许我们永远都触摸不到它，但只要肯追随它，它便会引领我们走向自己的命运。
